Charity Ukranian Fall Festival
Sunday September 14th
Sunday may 8th
Join us for a delicious brunch with live entertainment¬†while giving back to those in need.
All proceeds from this event will go directly to supporting Ukrainian refugees here in Jacksonville.
‚ú® Come eat, sip, enjoy the music ‚Äî and help us make a difference together.
11:00 AM - 02:00 PM
Buy Tickets
Bartender Cocktail Competition
Monday September 15th
Sunday may 8th
Head-to-head bartender competition to see who can mix up the best fall-inspired cocktail.
Anyone is welcome! Sign up to compete, or stop by to cheer on your favorite bartender.
Cash prize for top 3, and the winning cocktail will be featured on the refinery fall cocktail menu.
Snacks will be provided.
RSVP by September 1st to KIRA@REFINERYJAXBEACH.COM to take part in the competition.
FREE¬† EVENT

Alex Trendler Reads Your Mind
Tuesday October 21st
Sunday may 8th
Get ready for an unforgettable evening of paranormal entertainment. Alex Trendler is a psychic entertainer and sommelier from NYC. Blending mind-reading, hypnosis and humor, this intimate show blurs the line between reality and illusion.
Harsh skeptics and true believers are invited to join us for a show where ancient wine scrying, modern psychology, and a touch of magic come together for a night that's anything but ordinary.
üïñ Doors Open:
7:00 PM
üçΩ Full Menu Available:
Enjoy dinner before the show begins at 8PM
üç∏ Full Bar:
Craft cocktails, wine¬† & premium drinks served all night
ü™ë Group Seating:
This is a fully interactive performance ‚Äî all seating will be shared group seating for the ultimate experience. If you would like to be seated with your friends, please let us know.
üéü Tickets:
$32.25 per person ($30+$2.25 tax)
Come early, grab a bite, sip something special, and settle in for a night you won‚Äôt want to miss!
07:00 PM - 09:30 PM

map marker pin
831 1st Street North, Jacksonville Beach, FL 32250
View 831 1st Street North, Jacksonville Beach, FL 32250 on Google maps - opens in a new tab
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
More Than Just A Restaurant - An Experience
Whatever you're seeking, there's something for everyone and every taste at Refinery. We craft fresh, flavorful, chef-inspired cuisine and offer a variety of tasty options to suit most any palette. Whether catching a quick bite at the ocean bar, or dining upstairs with a breathtaking ocean view for that special occasion, or getting pull from one of our 20 tabs while enjoying live entertainment at the lounge, Refinery is Jacksonville Beach's neighborhood gathering place for friends, good times, outstanding service, and really 'fine' fare.
Our menu
end Right About us image
end About us item
For mobile devices animate the about_v8 section on page load if the video is on the cover and this section is 1st or 2nd below the cover.
Exterior, view of the restaurant and parking lot
Bartender making a cocktail
Avocado Caesar Salad
Togarashi Tuna, Crab Cake, and Honeymoon Phase cocktail
Crab cake, with Bearnaise sauce, asparagus, and toasted rye bread
Truffle Mushroom Swiss Burger and fries
Tequila Old Fashioned cocktail
Interior, dining area
Dining area, tables ready for guests
Tiramisu Martini
Honeymoon Phase cocktail
Fully set dining table
Crab cake, rye toast, and asparagus
Togarashi seared tuna, with sticky rice, edamame algae salad, and...
Surf and Turf, with steak and lobster tail

start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
Lounge
The Lounge at Refinery offers live music and variety of fun events, as well as our signature craft cocktails, great selection of beers and wines, pub & refined dining menu.
Events
start Right About us image
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
Ocean Bar
Ocean bar offers cool ocean breezes and convenient beach access for the romantic walks along the sands and surf. We offer our full menu (pub & refined dining), as well as our signature frozen cocktails and mocktails.
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
Refined Dining
Reserve your table for the finest oceanfront dining Jax Beach has to offer. Combining an incredible ocean view with delectable, Euro-American inspired cuisine nothing says special quite like Refinery. Our Chef's specialty menu is crafted using only the freshest, seasonal ingredients, made from scratch breads and savory signature sauces for a tastefully satisfying experience you'll return for again and again. Refinery promises delicious fare, an elegant ambient atmosphere and outstanding service creating a unique dining experience you are destined to remember. Join us Tuesday through Sunday for dinner.
start Right About us image
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
First Street Pub
The 1st Street Pub is Refinery's meet-up place to grab a pull from one of the 20 taps or our signature cocktails, as guests await friends or sit to catch the game. Whether seated inside or enjoying the 170-degree views of 1st Street from the patio, you won't miss a beat as you nosh on delicious, chef-inspired favorites including Euro-American specialty dishes, hand-held sandwiches, and shareable appetizers as you gaze out at the passersby cruising the strip. With great offers from our both menues, pub & refined dining, pub is the perfect place to sip and nosh.
end Right About us image
end About us item
For mobile devices animate the about_v8 section on page load if the video is on the cover and this section is 1st or 2nd below the cover.
Taste is everything
Our Menu
Breathtaking Views
Parties
Incredible Craft Cocktails
Drinks

slideshow start stop playing
Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Mechelle C:
What a cool place to meet up with friends. Next to the beach, they have inside, upstairs and downstairs seats. Service was excellent. We were meeting a friend for her birthday lunch and they all wished her well. It was nice. Felt like family here...
Review by - Yelp
Laura C:
The ambience was amazing, the food was delicious and I can't say enough good things about our server. He was so quick to respond and his personality definitely added to the experience. You also can't beat the view.
Review by - Yelp
Sean S:
Great place for a very nice dinner and and after dinner drink at the down stairs bar. The kitchen has picked up its game and definitely a place to go check out
Review by - Yelp
Evadne R:
Amazing place to have dinner. I dined on the 2nd floor & it was a great dining experience! Service was quick & attentive. Food was delicious & flavorful . 10/10
Review by - Yelp
Preya S:
Lovely place! Upstairs is so beautiful and elegant. Brunch was fantastic! Downstairs has more of a chill vibe! Lovely place in jax beach! Can't wait go back!
Stop reviews carousel
Play reviews carousel
Press & News
The 38 Best Florida Restaurants And Bars For Waterfront Views
"Refinery" was voted one of the Best Oceanfront Dining by Southern Living Magazine. Breathtaking views, unforgettable flavors, and an experience like no other.
Read More
The 15 best waterfront restaurants in Florida, as chosen by USA TODAY Network writers
USA Today names Refinery as top 15 best waterfront restaurants in Florida.
Read More
Refinery Jax Beach makes Yelp‚Äôs ‚Äò20 restaurants with ocean views as captivating as the food‚Äô
In the Jacksonville area, there‚Äôs no shortage of great ocean views to take in while dining, but one restaurant has been given extra recognition by Yelp.
Read More
Our Mission
To offer unforgettable oceanfront dining experience and inspire gathering of community and friends through the celebration of exceptional cuisine, beverage, and foodstuffs all while delivering on the promise of an outstanding guest experience whether dining on site or grab and go.
Newsletter

Jacksonville Beach, FL
32250

Start Section 2
MORE THAN JUST A RESTAURANT - AN EXPERIENCE
Whatever you're seeking, there's something for everyone and every taste at Refinery. We craft fresh, flavorful, chef-inspired cuisine and offer a variety of tasty options to suit most any palette. Whether catching a quick bite at the ocean bar, or dining upstairs with a breathtaking ocean view for that special occasion, or getting pull from one of our 20 tabs while enjoying live entertainment at the lounge, Refinery is Jacksonville Beach's neighborhood gathering place for friends, good times, outstanding service, and really 'fine' fare.
End Section 2

Lounge
The Lounge at Refinery offers live music and variety of fun events, as well as our signature craft cocktails, great selection of beers and wines, pub & refined dining menu.
Events
start Right About us image
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
Ocean Bar
Ocean bar offers cool ocean breezes and convenient beach access for the romantic walks along the sands and surf. We offer our full menu (pub & refined dining), as well as our signature frozen cocktails and mocktails.
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
Refined Dining
Reserve your table for the finest oceanfront dining Jax Beach has to offer. Combining an incredible ocean view with delectable, Euro-American inspired cuisine nothing says special quite like Refinery. Our Chef's specialty menu is crafted using only the freshest, seasonal ingredients, made from scratch breads and savory signature sauces for a tastefully satisfying experience you'll return for again and again. Refinery promises delicious fare, an elegant ambient atmosphere and outstanding service creating a unique dining experience you are destined to remember. Join us Tuesday through Sunday for dinner.
start Right About us image
end Right About us image
end About us item
start About us item
start Left About us image
end Left About us image
First Street Pub
The 1st Street Pub is Refinery's meet-up place to grab a pull from one of the 20 taps or our signature cocktails, as guests await friends or sit to catch the game. Whether seated inside or enjoying the 170-degree views of 1st Street from the patio, you won't miss a beat as you nosh on delicious, chef-inspired favorites including Euro-American specialty dishes, hand-held sandwiches, and shareable appetizers as you gaze out at the passersby cruising the strip. With great offers from our both menues, pub & refined dining, pub is the perfect place to sip and nosh.
end Right About us image
end About us item
